title: vAraNa vadanam
sahitya:
vAraNa vadanam varivashyAmi vAmadEva priya sutamaham sumukham


anupallavi

  vArivAha patinutam ananta mAra sama sundaram dvaita mAdhuram


caraNam    bAhulEyAgrajam panca bAhum vara pradam bhAsura dEham samasta dEvata sEvita pAdam 
sakalArcita jana kAmita phaladam sahiSNum praNava nAtha vinOdam satatam muraLIgAna vinOdam
